thread.title: BRIEF-Hp Inc says ‍On March 30, 2018, Co Entered Into Second Amended And Restated Revolving Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Hp Inc says ‍On March 30, 2018, Co Entered Into Second Amended And Restated Revolving Credit Facility

organizations.name: restated revolving credit facility reuters staff

text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Hp Inc:
* HP INC - ‍ON MARCH 30, 2018, CO ENTERED INTO A SECOND AMENDED AND RESTATED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY - SEC FILING
* HP INC - ‍AMENDED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY PROVIDES FOR SENIOR, UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY WITH AGGREGATE LENDING COMMITMENTS OF $4 BILLION
* HP INC - COMMITMENTS UNDER CREDIT AGREEMENT WILL BE AVAILABLE UNTIL THE PERIOD ENDING ON MARCH 30, 2023, MAY BE EXTENDEDBY UP TO TWO, ONE-YEAR PERIODS Source text - ( bit.ly/2pRv3Sm ) Further company coverage:
